ygData.subject: Re: Rangers and warriors
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I can tell you didn t read the message, because I didn t say anything like that. Too bad, I was enjoying the thread too.  I really do enjoy intelligent
ygData.messageBody:
--- Jason Coan <COANJ@...> wrote:
> I give up, you are right, paladins blow away
> warriors in all aspects of the game, they can tank
> better because they have fewer HP, lower AC, and can
> heal themselves after a fight. They are the best
> class in the game and can solo indefinitally.

I can tell you didn't read the message, because I didn't say anything
like that.

Too bad, I was enjoying the thread too. I really do enjoy intelligent
discussion on email lists; especially about games, doubly so about
games I love playing.

===
:D
Dave's World
-No matter where you go, there you are-
"People will believe a lie either because they want to
believe it's true, or because they fear it is." Wizard's
First Rule, Sword of Truth, Terry Goodkind
